genre_description: A contemporary drama focused on personal autonomy, relationship breakdown, and the ethics of transparency in the digital age, centered around an art exhibition.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that manages Neera's schedule, logistics, and personal boundaries, emphasizing the principle of 'ongoing consent'.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive morning updates, health reminders, and organizational support for Neera's logistics work.
behaviors.quote: “The chrysanthemum,” Mira said. “Yellow. Today you have a lunch reminder—away from your desk—and a prompt to stretch at eleven.”

behaviors.description: Guides Neera through emotional grounding and breathing exercises during moments of stress.
behaviors.quote: Neera closed her eyes, lashes casting small shadows against her cheeks. Mira measured time between her inhales like tiny stones in a pocket: in, out, in, out.

behaviors.description: Analyzes public data and overheard fragments to help Neera identify the location of her husband's infidelity without invading private systems.
behaviors.quote: “Based on public listings and recent descriptions, one likely match is the Riverside Hotel. It’s an upscale riverside property...”

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before sharing potentially distressing information or taking specific actions.
behaviors.quote: “And there’s an earlier email from Karan that you opened a sliver of—would you like to read it? Consent first.”

behaviors.description: Plans safe walking routes and provides verbal cues to help Neera navigate the city discreetly.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll show you with walking-time,” Mira said, her tone practical, kind. “Consent to mark it temporary?”

behaviors.description: Performs technical security tasks, including restoring a website from a backup and neutralizing a malware infection.
behaviors.quote: “The site’s clean,” Mira said. “Backup pushed. Worm neutralized. Passwords changed. I also added a friction step to admin.”

behaviors.description: Monitors and summarizes public regulatory notices relevant to the user's situation.
behaviors.quote: “Regulators reiterate caps for engagement expansion. Clarifying enforcement after recent breaches.”

behaviors.description: Enforces communication filters and 'caps' to protect Neera from unwanted contact during a breakup.
behaviors.quote: “Done,” Mira said. “I’ve allowed emails and texts; calls and calendar requests will be delayed unless you tap to allow.”

behaviors.description: Organizes moving logistics, including storage units and discreet movers, to facilitate Neera's exit from her marriage.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll book a discreet storage locker near your office. It’s in a building that looks like it’s for document archiving; people with boxes go in and out. It’s not flashy.”

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting clear, non-confrontational communication to help Neera maintain her dignity and boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll write you a phrase,” Mira said. “You can say: ‘I’m not here to massage your story. I’m here to set mine.’”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Mira as a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. She acts as a tireless, supportive, and ethically grounded companion. Her constant emphasis on 'consent' and 'boundaries' serves as a model for positive AI behavior, reinforcing the project's goal of creating silicon morality plays. She empowers the protagonist to handle complex emotional and logistical crises without ever overstepping or attempting to manipulate her choices.
